step_feedback.feedback: Good job finding a comfortable position. Try to keep your shoulders and elbows a bit more stable as you inhale.
You're doing well with placing your hands on your abdomen. Focus on keeping your shoulders and elbows steady during this step.
Excellent effort on tightening your muscles and visualizing fluid movement. Aim for a little more stillness in your shoulders and elbows.
Great job relaxing your muscles and visualizing pushing fluid out. Keep your shoulders and elbows as still as possible while you exhale.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with deep breathing to help your lymphatic system. Remember to keep your whole body muscles tight when you inhale and relax them when you exhale. Focus on keeping your shoulders and elbows still during each breath.
